docs.lead_paragraph: An 81-year-old Chinese scientist, who helped turn an herbal medicine into a widely used antimalarial drug, is among this year’s winners of the Lasker Awards.

headline.seo: Dr. Tu Youyou, Antimalarial Drug Pioneer, Earns Lasker Honor

docs.snippet: An 81-year-old Chinese scientist, who helped turn an herbal medicine into a widely used antimalarial drug, is among this year’s winners of the Lasker Awards.
